Working together, brainstorming solutions, and supporting each other’s businesses created friendships that go beyond BNI meetings.

my_business: Hello, I'm Shiva Kanth, representing Sreepuram Villas. We specialize in crafting residential open plots, villas, and private pool villas in the scenic setting of Yadagirigutta. Our dedication to delivering high-quality living spaces drives us to design homes that seamlessly blend with modern lifestyles. If you have any queries or specific interests regarding our project, feel free to reach out. Potential investors and homebuyers are welcome to connect with me for further details.
top_product: OPEN PLOTS , VILLAS , AND PRIVATE POOL VILLAS.
top_problem_solved: Once upon a time in a town, the Yadagirigutta Temple stood tall—a symbol of hope and spirituality. When the COVID-19 pandemic hit, the construction faced a daunting challenge. Many contractors turned away from the complicated ornamental contract, fearing the risks involved. But I saw an opportunity instead of an obstacle. Driven by my passion and vision for the temple's beauty, I stepped forward. With determination, I meticulously planned and worked tirelessly, even when faced with supply chain issues and safety protocols. As weeks passed, obstacles arose, but I refused to give up. Late nights and hard work paid off when, against all odds, I completed the intricate construction ahead of schedule. The temple now sparkled with breathtaking beauty, and I became a beacon of hope for my community. My story spread, inspiring others to tackle challenges head-on. In a time of fear, I showed that courage and dedication could lead to extraordinary achievements, turning the temple into a symbol of perseverance for all who dared to dream big.
my_favourite_bni_story: Every challenge is an opportunity in disguise. Just like the NRI who explored 20 different sites before choosing my project, perseverance and dedication lead to success. Trust the journey, believe in your vision, and remember that hard work pays off. Keep pushing forward; your breakthrough is closer than you think!
